Headline: 95th- bound Red Line Service Delayed at Chicago
ShortDescription: 95th- bound Red Line trains are standing at Chicago due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th- bound Red Line trains are standing at Chicago due to a mechanical problem. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at Blue Island/Wolcott
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via Blue Island, Damen, Cermak and Ashland: due to, a festival near Blue Island/Wolcott.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Blue Island, Damen, Cermak, Ashland and over regular route, due to a festival near Blue Island/Wolcott.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Bus Substitution Between Illinois Medical District and UIC-Halsted
ShortDescription: Shuttle buses replace Blue Line service between Illinois Medical District and UIC-Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Shuttle buses replace rail service between Illinois Medical District and UIC-Halsted.

Trains will run between O’Hare and UIC-Halsted, and between Forest Park and Illinois Medical District.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
We are performing construction at the Racine Blue Line station and Morgan substation.

MAP

Headline: 95th/Dan Ryan-bound Subway Trains Rerouted to Elevated Tracks
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated tracks between Fullerton and Cermak due to a mechanical problem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th/Dan Ryan-bound Red Line trains are temporarily rerouted to the elevated lines between Fullerton and Cermak-Chinatown due to a mechanical problem Red Line service to 95th/Dan Ryan

After stopping at Fullerton, 95th-bound trains will be diverted and will make the following elevated station stops:

  • Armitage (accessible)
  • Sedgwick (accessible)
  • Chicago (at Franklin; accessible)
  • Merchandise Mart (accessible)
  • Clark/lake (accessible)
  • State/Lake
  • Washington/Wabash (accessible)
  • Adams/Wabash
  • Roosevelt (elevated station west of Wabash; accessible)

Then, trains will stop at Cermak-Chinatown and make all normal stops to 95th/Dan Ryan.

Connections can be made between Howard-bound subway service and 95th-bound rerouted service via elevated lines at Fullerton (accessible), State/Lake (board at nearby elevated station on Orange Line side for 95th-bound Red Line service) and at Roosevelt (accessible).

We apologize for the inconvenience and are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Howard-bound service is not affected.
